segments.text: Well , there's this clock I was ... MY vintage clock ! How do you have my clock ? ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your vintage clock ? ! I just paid sixty-five dollars for it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sixty-five ? What the ... ? How did you bargain him down , Wei ? You've never even been to a flea market before !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It must be my special touch . I think bargaining is in my blood !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Never underestimate a woman when it comes to bargaining !
segments.speaker: S2
